definition.content: ratio of the total radiated power divided by the total power accepted by the antenna

notes.content: Antenna radiation efficiency (<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="inline">  <mstyle displaystyle="true">    <msub>      <mi>η</mi>      <mo></mo>    </msub>    <mtext>l</mtext>  </mstyle></math> ) is also called as Ohmic efficiency (<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="inline">  <mstyle displaystyle="true">    <msub>      <mi>η</mi>      <mi>Ω</mi>    </msub>  </mstyle></math>).
